title: A Place to live
creator_credit: Stuart Glover, Frank Bagnall, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Film Academy
brief_description: Story of immigration and discussion of how newcomers look for houses, units or commission housing on offer in the city. Immigration officers help migrants get loans and settle in ‘suburbia’, the ideal for many migrants.
creator_credit_for_label: Stuart Glover, Frank Bagnall, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Film Academy
